short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns every hidden-field on every website into a simple input text-field for editing. Press Ctrl+Shift+S on the website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a forked, updated version of Ramon Roessler's Hidden Field Switcher.

You can either use CTRL-ALT-S or clicking the extension icon to display/hide hidden fields in HTML forms.
